text.title: Live in a World Full of Preconceptions
text.head: Live in a World Full of Preconceptions
text.p: Your family , your neighbors , everybody has these preconceptions . You might ask yourself , " How should I behave ? " " What clothes should I wear ? " " Who should I be like ? " " How much should I score ? " " Which college should I go to ? " and so on and so forth . But now , you have decided that you are done with thinking about these questions . You want to live free . You want to learn to appreciate the small things in life . You want to be madly in love with life . If this describes what you want , then this wikiHow will help teach you how to live in a world full of preconceptions .
text.head: Steps

list.item:
Have a cause for hope , or a reason to live . Have something to look forward to . It might be to travel the world , or buy a motorcycle and ride cross country , or maybe you want to learn about different cultures .
Find beauty in the most odd and imperfect things - from an old , wrinkle faced woman bent over a fire , to a tiny flower growing on a hillside .

Learn to calm down . Take it in from one ear and let it out through the other . These days , you do n't really see anyone who is not willing to get into a fight . When you get stuck in an argument , take a deep breath . Listen to what the other person has to say . Think it through . Ask yourself : does what they said make sense ? Are they correct ? Are you wrong ?
If you do find sense in what they say , let them know . Accept your fault . If you find yourself to be the correct one , then do n't yell to make your point . Be calm . Explain your view to the person . If they refuse to understand , hope that they eventually will .

Be understanding . Understand one another , understand the needs of others , and understand the complications in the matter . See the situation through the other person 's point of view . Just this one step would make you a happy person . But do n't be disappointed if the other person fails to show understanding for your matter . Not everyone is like you .

Live free . Break society 's rules . If your elders tell you that it 's unladylike to wear shorts , do n't listen . People will always tell you what to do and what not to do because they all consider themselves better than others , and they think that their ideas and what they think is what is correct . Despair not , for that should not bother you . You are the maker of decisions your life . You can do what you love to do and what you know is right .
Remember that no one is broken too bad . There 's always that glue to fix you up . Your job is to find that glue .
